caption: Database
description: The database object is used for databases which are typically datastore services that contain an organized collection of structured and unstructured data or a types of data.
name: database

created_time.description: The time when the database was known to have been created.

groups.description: The group names to which the database belongs.

modified_time.description: The most recent time when any changes, updates, or modifications were made within the database.

name.description: The database name, ordinarily as assigned by a database administrator.

size.description: The size of the database in bytes.

type_id.description: The normalized identifier of the database type.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the database.

embedding_model.description: Model used for creating embeddings (if applicable). For example: text-embedding-ada-002 or all-MiniLM-L6-v2.
